mapper.select: SELECT S.*, (B.totalSeat-COUNT(T.id)) AS "remainingSeats" FROM ( SELECT * FROM service WHERE lineId = #{lineId} ) AS S LEFT JOIN bus AS B ON S.busId = B.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ticket WHERE departureDate = #{departureDate} ) AS T ON T.serviceId = S.id GROUP BY S.id

SELECT L.id, L.regDate, L.departure, L.destination, L.charge, S.departureTime AS extra__departureTime, S.estimatedTime AS extra__estimatedTime, S.busId AS extra__busId FROM line AS L LEFT JOIN service AS S ON S.lineId = L.id WHERE S.id = #{serviceId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ticket SET regDate = NOW(), `ticketCode` = #{ticketCode}, `departureDate` = #{departureDate}, `serviceId` = #{serviceId}, `seatNum` = #{seatNum}, `memberId` = #{memberId}, `email` = #{email}, `charge` = #{charge}
